BLOCK.QRY: update actia_audit_sch_trn t set t.str_audit_status=5 where t.num_audit_sch_no=? and t.gnum_hospital_code=?

INSERT INTO ACTIA_L_AUDIT_OBS_REP_REP_TRN (NUM_AUDIT_SCH_NO,STR_OBS_RPT_ACC_STATUS,STR_OBSERVATION_REPLY,STR_REMARKS,STR_REPLY_SUBMIT_BY,GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_MODIFY_SL_NO)(SELECT T.NUM_AUDIT_SCH_NO,T.STR_OBS_RPT_ACC_STATUS,T.STR_OBSERVATION_REPLY,T.STR_REMARKS,T.STR_REPLY_SUBMIT_BY,T.GNUM_ISVALID,T.GNUM_SEAT_ID,T.GDT_ENTRY_DATE,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,(select nvl(max(A.STR_MODIFY_SL_NO),0)+1 from ACTIA_L_AUDIT_OBS_REP_REP_TRN A where A.NUM_AUDIT_SCH_NO=T.NUM_AUDIT_SCH_NO and A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) FROM ACTIA_AUDIT_OBS_REP_REPLY_TRN T WHERE T.NUM_AUDIT_SCH_NO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?)

update ACTIA_AUDIT_OBS_REP_REPLY_TRN t set t.STR_OBS_RPT_ACC_STATUS=?,t.STR_OBSERVATION_REPLY=?,t.STR_REMARKS=?,t.STR_REPLY_SUBMIT_BY=?,t.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,t.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? where t.NUM_AUDIT_SCH_NO=? and t.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO ACTIA_AUDIT_PARATRACK_DTL z(z.num_audit_paratrack_slno, z.str_audit_body_code, z.str_para_details,z.dt_receive_msofc_date,z.STR_REPLY_NEW_PARA_AUDIT, z.gnum_isvalid,z.gnum_seat_id, z.gdt_entry_date, z.gdt_lstmod_date,z.gnum_lstmod_seatid, z.gnum_hospital_code, z.num_sl_no) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
